short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puts a button on Amazon products to buy from an Amazon alternative

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Puts a button on Amazon products to buy from Amazon alternatives.
When the button is pressed, It will search Duckduckgo or Google for the product and open the first result. The search engine can be configured.
Make sure to enable popups on Amazon.com if you're having issues!
